com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.test

Class AbstractPluginIT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.test.AbstractPluginIT
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileScannerIT, ZipScannerIT

    public class AbstractPluginIT
extends Object
    Abstract base class for analysis tests.
